00158 u8 macSetAlarm(u16 time, void(*callback)(void))
00159 {
00160     u8 i;
00161     u16 ticks;
00162 
00163     if (!time)
00164     {
00165         // Don't delay, just call it
00166         callback();
00167         return 0;
00168     }
00169 
00170     // Store the timer details in the array
00171     ticks = max(time, 1);  // At least one tick
00172 
00173     // Protect this section from an ISR that will add an alarm
00174     AVR_ENTER_CRITICAL_REGION();
00175     // search for free event structure
00176     for (i=0;i<TIMER_EVENTS_MAX;i++)
00177         if (!timerEvents[i].time)
00178             // free, use this one
00179             break;
00180 
00181     if (i >= TIMER_EVENTS_MAX)
00182         // Out of timers to use, just quit
00183         return 0;
00184 
00185     timerEvents[i].time = ticks;
00186     timerEvents[i].callback = callback;
00187     // don't return zero as a timer ID
00188     timerEvents[i].timerID = getUniqueID();
00189 
00190     // start timer running, since we have at least one timer running
00191     timerStart();
00192     AVR_LEAVE_CRITICAL_REGION();
00193 
00194     return timerEvents[i].timerID;
00195 }

00204 u8 macSetLongAlarm(u16 seconds, void(*callback)(void))
00205 {
00206     // Only use long alarms with app or 6lowpan
00207     if (APP || IPV6LOWPAN)
00208     {
00209         // Find a free timer
00210         u8 i;
00211         
00212         if (!seconds)
00213         {
00214             // Just go right now
00215             callback();
00216             return 0;
00217         }
00218         
00219         for (i=0;i<LONG_TIMER_EVENTS_MAX;i++)
00220             if (!longTimerEvents[i].time)
00221                 // free, use this one
00222                 break;
00223         
00224         if (i >= LONG_TIMER_EVENTS_MAX)
00225             // No more timers, just quit
00226             return 0;
00227         
00228         // Store the time and callback into free timer
00229         longTimerEvents[i].time = seconds;
00230         longTimerEvents[i].callback = callback;
00231         longTimerEvents[i].timerID = getUniqueID();
00232         
00233         // start timer running, since we have at least one timer running
00234         AVR_ENTER_CRITICAL_REGION();
00235         timerStart();
00236         AVR_LEAVE_CRITICAL_REGION();
00237         
00238         return longTimerEvents[i].timerID;
00239     }
00240     return 0;
00241 }

00248 static u8 getUniqueID(void)
00249 {
00250     static u8 currentTimerID;
00251     u8 i,goodID;
00252 
00253     currentTimerID++;
00254     for(;;)
00255     {
00256         // don't return zero as an ID, macSetAlarm return zero on error
00257         if (!currentTimerID)
00258             currentTimerID++;
00259 
00260         // See if this ID is used by any active timer
00261         goodID = 1;
00262         for (i=0;i<TIMER_EVENTS_MAX;i++)
00263             if (timerEvents[i].timerID == currentTimerID)
00264                 goodID = 0;
00265         if (APP || IPV6LOWPAN)
00266         {
00267             for (i=0;i<LONG_TIMER_EVENTS_MAX;i++)
00268                 if (longTimerEvents[i].timerID == currentTimerID)
00269                     goodID = 0;
00270         }
00271         if (goodID)
00272             // unused ID, use this one
00273             return currentTimerID;
00274         // ID already exists, try again skippy
00275         currentTimerID++;
00276     }
00277 }

00287 void macTimerEnd(u8 timerID)
00288 {
00289     u8 i;
00290 
00291     // search for timer with timerID
00292     for (i=0;i<TIMER_EVENTS_MAX;i++)
00293         if (timerEvents[i].timerID == timerID)
00294         {
00295             // kill this timer
00296             timerEvents[i].time = 0;
00297             timerEvents[i].timerID = 0;
00298             return;
00299         }
00300 
00301     // search for long timer with timerID
00302     if (APP || IPV6LOWPAN)
00303     {
00304         for (i=0;i<LONG_TIMER_EVENTS_MAX;i++)
00305             if (longTimerEvents[i].timerID == timerID)
00306             {
00307                 // kill this timer
00308                 longTimerEvents[i].time = 0;
00309                 longTimerEvents[i].timerID = 0;
00310                 return;
00311             }
00312     }
00313 }

00332 static void timerStart(void)
00333 {
00334     if (!timerRunning)
00335     {
00336         // Clear timer counter value.
00337         TIMER_CLEAR();
00338 
00339         // Enable TIMER3 output compare interrupt.
00340         TIMER_ENABLE();
00341         timerRunning = 1;
00342     }
00343 }

00348 ISR(TICKVECT)
00349 {
00350     u8 i;
00351     event_object_t event;
00352 
00353     tickTimer++;
00354     
00355 #if ((IPV6LOWPAN && RUMSLEEP) && (NODETYPE == ENDDEVICE))
00356     
00357     if ((tickTimer == nodeSleepTimeout) && nodeSleepTimeout)
00358     {
00359         //Disable timeout
00360         nodeSleepTimeout = 0;
00361         
00362         // Sleep timer expired!
00363         event.event = MAC_EVENT_TIMER;  // Event type, see event_t for details.
00364         event.data = (u8*)sixlowpanSleep_timeout;
00365         mac_put_event(&event);
00366     }
00367 #endif
00368     
00369     // Decrement second timer
00370     if (APP || IPV6LOWPAN)
00371     {
00372         if (!--secondTimer)
00373         {
00374             // Reset one second timer
00375             secondTimer = 1000/MS_PER_TICK;
00376             // Handle the one-second timers
00377             for (i=0;i<LONG_TIMER_EVENTS_MAX;i++)
00378             {
00379                 if (longTimerEvents[i].time)
00380                 {
00381                     // This timer is active, check for expiration
00382                     if (!--longTimerEvents[i].time)
00383                     {
00384                         // Timer expired, queue the associated callback
00385                         event.event = MAC_EVENT_TIMER;  // Event type, see event_t for details.
00386                         event.data = (u8*)longTimerEvents[i].callback;
00387                         mac_put_event(&event);
00388                     }
00389                 }
00390             }
00391         }
00392     }
00393 
00394     // check for pending events
00395     for (i=0;i<TIMER_EVENTS_MAX;i++)
00396     {
00397         if (timerEvents[i].time)
00398         {
00399             // this timer event is live, check for expiration
00400             if (!--timerEvents[i].time)
00401             {
00402                 // Timer expired, queue the associated callback
00403                 event.event = MAC_EVENT_TIMER;  // Event type, see event_t for details.
00404                 event.data = (u8*)timerEvents[i].callback;
00405                 mac_put_event(&event);
00406             }
00407         }
00408     }
00409 }
